name: Lemonade Stand
tag_list: point-of-sale, pos, retail, e-commerce, software, payment-gateway
overview: Lemonade Stand is a cloud-based point of sale solution and payment gateway designed for small business. Working across all platforms (Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android) Lemonade Stand turns any device into a point-of-sale system. Through extendable apps, widgets, and APIs, developers can design their own software to really extend the power of Lemonade Stand. With cloud integration,all data is synced across all online, in-person, and mobile sales through one simple, easy to learn program.
